Functions
readConfigReads configuration file
commandSystemSend SIG_USR1 signal to qpf, to trigger the START message to be sent, or send STOP message, depending on the current status
transitToOperationalPerform all setup tasks before stepping into Operational
initInitialize non-GUI part of the component
initLogWatch
setLogWatch
sendInDataSend sample InData message to Event Manager
prepareSendMultInDataPrepare a set of sample InData messages to be sent to Event Manager
selectInDataParamsFileSelect user-defined InData parameters file
prepareSendInDataFromFileSend a set of sample InData messages to Event Manager, according to a user-defined file
sendMultInDataSend a set of sample InData messages to Event Manager
sendInDataFromFileSend a set of sample InData messages to Event Manager, as specified in a used-created file
stopSendingMessagesStop any timed message transmission
checkForTaskResChecks if there is Task Res Info and gather any info available
showTaskResShows any available Task Result Info data
showWorkDirOpen file manager with task directory
displayTaskInfoShow dialog with task information
displayTaskInfoShow dialog with task information
displayTaskInfoShow dialog with task information
